Calls1 module

Calls1.charge_wallet_route(username, amount)[source]

Endpoint for charging a customer’s wallet.

Parameters:

  • username (str) – The username of the customer.

  • amount (float) – The amount to be added to the wallet.

Returns:

A JSON response containing a status message.

Return type:

jsonify

Calls1.deduct_wallet_route(username, amount)[source]

Endpoint for deducting money from a customer’s wallet.

Parameters:

  • username (str) – The username of the customer.

  • amount (float) – The amount to be deducted from the wallet.

Returns:

A JSON response containing a status message.

Return type:

jsonify

Calls1.delete_customer_route(customer_id)[source]

Endpoint for deleting a customer by their ID.

Parameters:

customer_id (int) – The ID of the customer to be deleted.

Returns:

A JSON response containing a status message.

Return type:

jsonify

Calls1.get_customer_by_username_route(username)[source]

Endpoint for retrieving a customer by their username.

Parameters:

username (str) – The username of the customer.

Returns:

A JSON response containing the customer information or an empty response if not found.

Return type:

jsonify

Calls1.get_customers_route()[source]

Endpoint for retrieving a list of all customers.

Returns:

A JSON response containing a list of customer information.

Return type:

jsonify

Calls1.register_customer()[source]

Endpoint for registering a new customer.

Expects a JSON payload in the request with customer information.

Returns:

A JSON response containing the inserted customer information or an error message.

Return type:

jsonify

Calls1.update_customer_route()[source]

Endpoint for updating customer information.

Expects a JSON payload in the request with updated customer information.

Returns:

A JSON response containing the updated customer information or an empty response if an error occurs.

Return type:

jsonify
